section.56: Fighting for the Cause of Allah (Jihaad)

hadiths.text: Narrated As-Sa'-ib bin Yazid:I was in the company of Talha bin 'Ubaidullah, Sa`d, Al-Miqdad bin Al-Aswad and `Abdur Rahman bin `Auf and I heard none of them narrating anything from Allah's Messenger (ï·º) but Talha was talking about the day (of the battle) of Uhud
